creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: standing figure wearing a hat, rowing a boat LLC; tall, dark, curvaceous land form at center, reflected in water, with lighter land forms at L and R; dark trees at L; Li River, People's Republic of China
markings: \'#10019/\'WONDER LAND\'\', in black ink, on back; \'#A-1\', in blue ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP/60 CONTINENTAL AVE/FOREST HILLS, NY, 11375, USA\', stamped, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back
title: Wonderland
